title: The Ugly Dachshund
description: Tono, a great dane growing up with a family of dachshunds, is almost heartbroken because he is not treated as the others are."Stern's 1938 novel is considered one of the few unsentimental dog stories. No small feat, which may have been accomplished because the book really is a satire on human nature." --Classic Returns, Library Journal"This handsome edition, happily rescues a minor masterpiece from undeserved oblivion. Grab it while you can." --Bud Boccone, AKC Gazette
author: G.B. Stern
